siteMetadata.title: Piotr Mionskowski
siteMetadata.subtitle: Piotr Mionskowski's thoughts on software, technology, architecture, design patterns and programming in general.

node.excerpt: I had to solve a seemingly trivial bug in an angularjs based application that turned out to be more interesting than usual. The bug The bug report stated that “Clicking on a label causes page reload”. That should be an easy one I thought to myself and openeded chrome inspector to see a structure of DOM. Here’s a…
